Text: International Migration (journal):  The journal was established in 1961 under the name "Migration"; the name was changed in 1963 to "International Migration".

<Text: International Migration (journal):  The journal publishes articles written by demographers, economists, political scientists, sociologists and other social scientists.>
Triplets:<International Migration
3:
--------------------
<Text: International Migration (journal):  "International Migration" publishes on topics relating to migration such as asylum, development, emigration, human rights, labor, remittance and refugees.>
